alert.note: Alert for Finney (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 20 at 10:36PM CDT until July 21 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Northwestern Finney County in southwestern Kansas... * Until 145 AM CDT. * At 1036 PM CDT, the public reported thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 0.5 to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Public reported street flooding in Garden City and flash flooding in rural Finney county. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Garden City, Holcomb and Friend. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
